title: Why Nike Can Afford to Drop Kyrie Irving, Exerts Say
description: Kyrie Irvingâ€™s relationship with the athletic apparel giant has been lucrative, but his recent post about an antisemitic movie has led the company to suspend its dealings with him.
dc:creator: Julie Creswell and Jordyn Holman
media:description: Nike has suspended its relationship with Kyrie Irving and will no longer release his new shoe, which was supposed to become available this week.
